author: James Joyce
text: Dear Miss Weaver: Of course you didnâ€™t believe I was really finished with Yb for all. This week I have been cabling, phoning, writing express letters etc but at last he comes out Monday, only 31 days behind scheduled time. I will send you a few shafts of moonlight on some of the duskier bits as soon as the text is released. With kindest regards sincerely yours James Joyce
